Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A small, pale-blue glazed faience figure of the dwarf Pataikos. He is standing in characteristic pose, naked with a shaved head and arms on his knees. The modelling is crude. The head is pierced at the rear for suspension. Pataikoi were associated with Horus-the-Child cippi and were considered to have protective powers.
